bibl.title: John Morrisey v. Territory of Washington. Order of Writ.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

keywords.term: A. Reeves Aymes J.B. Thompson C.P. Lacy

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla | ss
In the District Court First Judicial District
The United States of America To George F Thomas Sheriff of Walla Walla County Washington Territory

You are hereby commanded to have the body of John Morrisey by you imprisoned and detined as it is said together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and dentention by whasoever name said John Morrisy shall be called or charged before Hon. Samuel C. Wingard Judge of the District of Washington Territory at his Chambers at Walla Walla City Washington Territory on the 31st day of August AD 1878 at the hour of 10 O'clock A.M. of that day to do and recieve what shall then and there be considere concerning the said John Morrisey and have you then and there
this Writ
Witness the Hon. Samuel C. Wingard Judge of the District Court of the First Judicial District of Washington Territory and the Seal of said Court affixed this 29th say of August A.D. 1878
div1.ab: A. Reeves Aymes Clerk by J.B. Thompson Deputy (seal)
